trans-unit.source: Send Push Notifications to Authenticated Users
trans-unit.target: Send Push Notifications to Authenticated Users

trans-unit.source: Learn how to send push notifications to specific users
trans-unit.target: Learn how to send push notifications to specific users

trans-unit.source: Send Push Notifications to Authenticated Users
trans-unit.target: Send Push Notifications to Authenticated Users

trans-unit.source: In this topic, you learn how to send push notifications to an authenticated user on iOS.
trans-unit.target: In this topic, you learn how to send push notifications to an authenticated user on iOS.

trans-unit.source: Before starting this tutorial, complete [Get started with authentication] and [Get started with push notifications] first.
trans-unit.target: Before starting this tutorial, complete [Get started with authentication] and [Get started with push notifications] first.

trans-unit.source: In this tutorial, you require users to authenticate first, register with the notification hub for push notifications, and update server scripts to send those notifications to only authenticated users.
trans-unit.target: In this tutorial, you require users to authenticate first, register with the notification hub for push notifications, and update server scripts to send those notifications to only authenticated users.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Update Service to Require Authentication to Register
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Update Service to Require Authentication to Register

trans-unit.source: Replace the insert function with the following code, then click Save.
trans-unit.target: Replace the insert function with the following code, then click Save.
